headline.main: Home Fans Vital for Barca to Reach Cup Final, Coach Says
headline.print_headline: Home Fans Vital for Barca to Reach Cup Final, Coach Says

docs.snippet: Because certain drugs can be dangerous if taken accidentally, the F.D.A. recommends that they be flushed down the toilet once no longer needed....

docs.snippet: Investor uncertainty about France's presidential election took its toll on French bonds on Monday, pushing up the premium investors demand for holding French over German government bonds  to its highest in almost four years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investor uncertainty about France's presidential election took its toll on French bonds on Monday, pushing up the premium investors demand for holding French over German government bonds  to its highest in almost four years.

headline.main: Investors Shun French Bonds on Election Jitters, Seek Safety in Germany
headline.print_headline: Investors Shun French Bonds on Election Jitters, Seek Safety in Germany

docs.snippet: European Union nations could save 50 billion euros (£43 billion) a year by fully carrying out existing environmental laws in areas such as air pollution and waste, the European Commission said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Union nations could save 50 billion euros (£43 billion) a year by fully carrying out existing environmental laws in areas such as air pollution and waste, the European Commission said on Monday.

headline.main: EU Falls Short in Applying Air Pollution, Waste Laws-Commission
headline.print_headline: EU Falls Short in Applying Air Pollution, Waste Laws-Commission

docs.snippet: The pace of consolidation in the crisis-hit shipping industry accelerated on Monday after three of Norway's biggest offshore oil industry service vessel (OSV) operators announced plans to merge to create one of the biggest fleets in the sector....

headline.main: Norwegian Firms to Create Offshore Oil Industry Supply Vessels Giant
headline.print_headline: Norwegian Firms to Create Offshore Oil Industry Supply Vessels Giant

docs.snippet: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) would beat Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives if an election was held today, a poll said on Monday, showing the center-left party was still building on positive momentum after electing Martin Schulz as leader...
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's Social Democrats (SPD) would beat Chancellor Angela Merkel's conservatives if an election was held today, a poll said on Monday, showing the center-left party was still building on positive momentum after electing Martin Schulz as leader.

headline.main: Germany's SPD Seen Beating Merkel's Conservatives in Election: Poll
headline.print_headline: Germany's SPD Seen Beating Merkel's Conservatives in Election: Poll

docs.snippet: Fox Television's broadcast of Super Bowl LI on Sunday night drew 111.3 million viewers, according to Nielsen data released by the network on Monday, the smallest audience for the National Football League's title game in four years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fox Television's broadcast of Super Bowl LI on Sunday night drew 111.3 million viewers, according to Nielsen data released by the network on Monday, the smallest audience for the National Football League's title game in four years.

headline.main: Despite Overtime Finish, NFL Super Bowl Draws Lower TV Ratings
headline.print_headline: Despite Overtime Finish, NFL Super Bowl Draws Lower TV Ratings
